classification: Foreign Political Matters, Cuba, CIA Liaison Material
summary: This document contains a memo from the FBI regarding Raul Roa, Cuban Foreign Minister, commenting on the Sino-Indian conflict and the situation in Cuba in 1963. Roa's evaluation of the situation in Cuba was highly pessimistic and he expressed concerns about the United Nations and the Organization of American States (OAS).
title: FOREIGN POLITICAL MATTERS - CUBA
